name: Advance FPS controller Demo by Game Rooks
name_original: Advance FPS controller Demo by Game Rooks
description:
This is an advanced first Person Shooters games character controller demo made with unity and c#.

I am working on this character controller system from past few weeks and now it is almost done and I need someone to test this controller and review for further processing.

Features:

1. Smooth movements.

2. Weapon switch system with animations.

3. Reload system with animations.

4. Aiming and sniper scope system.

5. Grenait bombing system.

6. Two environment sets home town and military base.

Note : please subscribe to our youtube channel and follow us on itch.io for more free contents and updates.

Donate to support us and this character controller as I might release this controller for free after an targeted amount of support.

Thank you,
